Description: This listing is for a 2018 Gibson Les Paul classic with p90 pickups. The guitar is in mint brand new showroom condition. My customer purchased the guitar brand new and changed the tuners out to planet waves locking tuners(he puts them on all of his guitar) He plugged the guitar in at home and decided he didn't like the p90's so we took the guitar back in trade.This guitar has all the original paperwork even the picture Gibson sends of it on there bench.guitar has original hardshell case. Gibson Les Paul Classic 2018, Pelham Blue OverviewThe Gibson Les Paul Classic Electric Guitar, Pelham Blue (2018) embodies everything that made the Les Paul such an iconic guitar, designed to deliver its classic look and legendary tone. Its set of P90 pickups deliver the classic Gibson tone, offering the iconic fat snarl and crunchy bite which helped define blues and rock'n'roll. The lightweight mahogany body is topped with plain maple in a stylish Pelham blue finish, creating an incredibly stunning instrument with warm characteristics. The slim taper profile and smooth body contours provide an amazingly comfortable performance, and allows players to deliver fast hand movements for excellent solos and chords. Its ABR tune-o-matic bridge and kidney Grover tuners offer incredible string stability, enhancing the Gibson's natural sustain and resonance for added punch. The guitar also features a tektoid nut to help increase the harmonics in the mid and upper frequency range. Transported in a hardshell case for protection, the Gibson Les Paul Classic is perfect for players wanting the vintage Gibson tone and style with modern reliability.Classic P90 Pickups Produce Vintage Gibson Snarl, Crunch & BiteLightweight Mahogany Body & Neck Offer Warm CharacteristicsSlim Taper Neck Profile Provides Smooth, Comfortable PlayABR Bright & Tektoid Nut Enhance String Sustain & StabilityIncludes Hardshell Case for Transportation & Storage
Title: Gibson Les Paul Classic P90 Electric Guitar Pelham Blue w/ OHSC (2018) MINT
